extensionDescription.message: A tool for editing text spacing properties on web pages. WCAG conformance information included.

toggleCommand.message: Enable or disable custom text spacing properties.
toggleCommand.description: A description of the keyboard shortcut in a browser.

propertiesWereSetToWCAG.message: Custom text spacing properties were set to WCAG values.

propertiesWereResetToDefaults.message: Custom text spacing properties were reset to their default values.

propertyWasResetToDefault.message: Custom $PROPERTY$ was reset to its default value.

instructionsForUsage.message: How to use Text Spacing Editor?

instructionsForActive.message: Use the Active switcher at the top to activate or deactivate your custom text spacing properties and all interactive controls of this extension. You can also use a key shortcut Ctrl+Shift+F (Command+Shift+F on Mac) for this (feel free to set your custom key shortcut in the extension settings of your browser). Being able to toggle custom properties is handy for testing and storing custom settings.

instructionsForWCAGButton.message: Use the Set WCAG values button to set all the custom text spacing properties to the WCAG conformance values.

instructionsForResetAllButton.message: Use the Reset all values button to reset all the text spacing properties to their default values.

instructionsForSliders.message: Use either the sliders or the Decrease and Increase buttons (that support long-press event) to set the values of the individual text spacing properties.

instructionsForReset.message: Use the Reset button to reset the values of the individual text spacing properties.

instructionsForIframe.message: Text Spacing Editor supports iframes (also nested) on the same origin. The extension may not function within iframes from different websites due to web security restrictions.

instructionsForWCAGOne.message: You can use Text Spacing Editor to test WCAG criterion 1.4.12 - Text Spacing - AA that says the following:

instructionsForWCAGTwo.message: No loss of content or functionality occurs by setting all of these properties to the following values:

instructionsForWCAGConformance.message:
• Line height to at least 1.5 times the font size.
  • Letter spacing to at least 0.12 times the font size.
  • Word spacing to at least 0.16 times the font size.
  • Spacing following paragraphs to at least 2 times the font size.

assistance.message: We are here to assist you! If you encounter issues, have suggestions, or want to get in touch, please create a new issue on GitHub or contact us via e-mail at devs@actumdigital.com.

scriptBlockingInfo.message: Please be aware that while Text Spacing Editor works on most websites, it may not function on websites that have strict script-blocking policies. Some websites, for security reasons, prevent extensions like ours from running scripts to modify text spacing.
